meta.source: Virgin Voyages official site, VV Insider, Cruise Lowdown, Freestyle Travelers, Magical Traveller, CamJon Travel — 3+ source agreement

venues.name: The Wake
venues.description: Upscale steakhouse and seafood restaurant with 1950s glamour, raw bar, and tableside martini service. Also serves brunch with bottomless drink option ($35).

venues.name: Pink Agave
venues.description: Contemporary Mexican restaurant featuring tlayudas, ceviches, mole, and the widest assortment of mezcal and tequila at sea. Tom Dixon-designed interior. Entirely gluten-free menu.

venues.name: Extra Virgin
venues.description: Italian trattoria with fresh handmade pasta, charcuterie boards, and a tableside affogato cart. Half-portions of pasta available to try more dishes.

venues.name: Gunbae
venues.description: Interactive Korean BBQ with flameless tabletop grills, banchan spreads, and complimentary soju to start. Refreshed 2025 menu with new stews and seafood grill options.

venues.name: Razzle Dazzle
venues.description: American comfort restaurant with vegetarian-forward options. Serves breakfast, brunch, and dinner. Features a secret off-menu burger. On Scarlet Lady this venue is Lucky Lotus (Chinese-inspired); on Brilliant Lady it is Rojo (Spanish-inspired).

venues.name: The Test Kitchen
venues.description: Laboratory-styled tasting restaurant inspired by Escoffier's Ma Cuisine. Fixed 6-course mystery menu lists only key ingredients — dishes are a surprise. Rotates between Menu A, B, and C across voyages. Optional drink pairings ($25–$35).

venues.name: The Galley
venues.description: 24-hour food hall replacing the traditional buffet. Multiple counter-service stations including sushi, tacos, noodles, burgers, bakery, and a 24-hour diner. No reservations needed.

venues.name: The Pizza Place
venues.description: Beach club-inspired brick-oven pizza parlor with build-your-own and signature pies. Gluten-free options available.

venues.name: The Dock & The Dock House
venues.description: Mediterranean-inspired lounge with small plates, dips, mezze, and flame-grilled skewers. Indoor (Dock House) and outdoor (Dock) seating with ocean views.

venues.name: Sun Club Café
venues.description: Hawaiian-inspired poke bowl station near the pool area with chicken, tuna, or salmon bowls. Vegetarian options available.

venues.name: Lick Me Till Ice Cream
venues.description: Homemade ice cream and gelato parlor with 6 rotating flavors daily. Cone or cup, gluten-free options available.

venues.name: Grounds Club
venues.description: Premium coffee bar with two locations. Complimentary drip coffee and tea; barista-prepared espresso drinks at extra cost. Light pastries and bites included.

venues.name: Ship Eats
venues.description: In-cabin room service available 24/7. $7 delivery fee (waived with alcoholic beverage order). Breakfast, snacks, and late-night options.

venues.name: Sip Lounge
venues.description: Champagne specialist lounge with premium wines and craft cocktails. Also hosts afternoon tea service ($19, or $39 with a glass of fizz). Sandwiches, scones, and petit fours included.

venues.name: On The Rocks
venues.description: The largest bar onboard, set in the Roundabout atrium on Deck 6. Aged whiskies, craft cocktails, and live entertainment most nights.

venues.name: Draught Haus
venues.description: Industrial-style craft beer bar with 8 taps, artisanal bottled beers, and boilermaker pairings. Growler service available for cabins.

venues.name: The Loose Cannon
venues.description: Brighton-inspired nautical pub with wooden tables, navy bentwood stools, and casual pints. Pub grub available.

venues.name: The Social Club
venues.description: Gaming lounge with arcade games, shuffleboard, and board games. Serves milkshakes (spiked optional), floats, hot dogs, wings, and nachos.

venues.name: The Manor
venues.description: Two-story signature nightclub inspired by Richard Branson's first recording studio. Hosts headline shows that transition into late-night dancing. Three bars across two levels.

venues.name: Casino Bar
venues.description: Convenient bar adjacent to the casino floor on Deck 6. Quick service during peak hours.

venues.name: Gym & Tonic
venues.description: Pool-adjacent bar between the gym and whirlpool area. Smoothies, fresh juices, frozen cocktails, and recovery beverages.

venues.name: Aquatic Club Bar
venues.description: Main pool deck bar with vintage Hollywood aesthetic and purple loungers. Frozen cocktails, juices, and full bar service.

venues.name: Athletic Club Bar
venues.description: 1920s NYC sports club-style bar with daybeds, catamaran net access, and wake views. Health-conscious options plus standard cocktails.

venues.name: Sun Club Bar
venues.description: Upper deck bar overlooking the Aquatic Club below. Red bistro tables and cabanas. Frozen cocktails and full bar.

venues.name: Richard's Rooftop
venues.description: Exclusive VIP lounge for Rockstar and Mega-Rockstar Suite guests only. Tom Dixon-designed with complimentary cocktail soirées and sunset happy hours.

venues.name: The Red Room
venues.description: Transformational multi-form theater that converts between traditional proscenium stage and flat-floor dance party configurations. Hosts headline productions and immersive shows.

venues.name: The Groupie
venues.description: Private bookable karaoke rooms with decades of song selections across all genres. Perfect for group celebrations.

venues.name: The Casino
venues.description: Gaming venue with 115 slot machines across themed districts (Little Asia, Ocean Drive, Adventure Alley) plus table games including craps, roulette, blackjack, and poker variants.
venues.hours: At sea and in select ports

venues.name: Voyage Vinyl
venues.description: Curated record shop with music magazines, headphones, record players, and a selection of classic and current albums including limited editions.

venues.name: Persephone
venues.description: Immersive modern theater production retelling the classic Greek myth of Persephone through contemporary staging, dance, and spectacle.

venues.name: Booked!
venues.description: Musical production where a cursed book bursts open and ship librarian Lola must sing, dance, and fight through stories come alive. Prequel to Lola's Library.

venues.name: Duel Reality
venues.description: Thrilling acrobatic retelling of Romeo & Juliet developed exclusively for Virgin Voyages. So popular it launched a US land tour.

venues.name: Lola's Library
venues.description: Part cocktail soirée, part immersive cabaret. Follow a cast of characters through an eclectic book collection in this No Ceilings Entertainment production.

venues.name: Another Rose
venues.description: Acrobatic love story blending cabaret and immersive theater, produced by Randy Weiner exclusively for Virgin Voyages.

venues.name: The Miss Behave Show
venues.description: Interactive game show created by Amy Saunders. Win and lose points in this never-the-same-show-twice audience participation experience.

venues.name: The Magnets
venues.description: A cappella performance group delivering beatboxing, harmonies, and high energy. Performers from London's West End and royal events.

venues.name: Up With a Twist
venues.description: Supper Club Series by Kaleidoscope Immersive set in Lady Valentina's Emporium of Excess. Choose-your-own-adventure with cocktails, couture, and reimagined hits.

venues.name: Murder in the Manor
venues.description: An 80s-soaked mystery of glitz, gossip, and gore by No Ceilings. Immersive theater with killer dance moves, synth-pop, and savage twists.

venues.name: Disco Circus
venues.description: Euphoric disco bash with wild acrobatics, games, and groovy looks. Created with the cast of Duel Reality. Closes the voyage.

venues.name: Out of Time
venues.description: Dr. Victoria Vortex and her time machine on a whirlwind ride from dinosaurs to the roaring '20s. Wild moves and big laughs.

venues.name: Scarlet Night
venues.description: Immersive celebration with pop-up performances, live music, and a drenched-in-red pool dance party. Signature fleet-wide event on every voyage.

venues.name: Club Caliente
venues.description: Latin dance party in The Manor with salsa, bachata, reggaeton, and Latin pop. High-energy and dress-to-impress.

venues.name: Klub Rubiks
venues.description: 80s-themed dance party with house, groove, funk, pop, and disco. Period fashion encouraged.

venues.name: We Fancy
venues.description: Evening of glamorous expression with global beats and a WOW moment. Dress as the fanciest version of yourself.

venues.name: Electric
venues.description: Neon glow party with black lights, UV-reactive face paint, a Jellyfish Parade, and glowing photo ops.

venues.name: PJ Party
venues.description: Comfort-first club night where all pajama styles are welcome — cozy PJs, zany PJs, even onesies.
